resources.string: BMR, or Basal Metabolic Rate is the calories your body needs to carry out basic body activities!

Calculate BMR is an Android application for calculating Basal Metabolic Rate (BMR) so that one can find out the calories your body needs to carry out basic body activities. 

The way to calculate BMR is as follows: 
\Male BMR = 66.5 + (13.7 × body weight) + (5 × height) – (6.8 × age) 
Female BMR = 655 + (9.6 × body weight) + (1.8 × height) – (4.7 × age) 

Then the results are multiplied by the level of activity carried out: 
\Rarely x 1.2 
\Light x 1,375 
\Moderate x 1.55 
\Height x 1.9 T 

This application was created for Assessment 1 class mobpro1.

Weight: %1$s kg
Height: %2$s cm
Gender: %3$s
Age: %4$s years old
Activity Type: %5$s

BMR: %6$s
 Daily Calories Needed: %7$s
